alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 02 at 6:30PM MDT until October 02 at 7:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Oglala Lakota County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 730 PM MDT. * At 630 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles north of Hay Springs, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Pine Ridge and Slim Buttes Housing around 635 PM MDT. Calico and Number 4 around 640 PM MDT. Oglala, Loneman, and South Lakeside around 645 PM MDT. Dry Wood Housing around 655 PM MDT. Manderson around 700 PM MDT. Goose Neck Housing and Lonesome Valley around 705 PM MDT. Intersection of Red Shirt and Cuny Table Roads and southwestern Badlands National Park around 710 PM MDT. Rockyford around 715 PM MDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move immediately to shelter inside a strong building. Stay away from windows.
